headline: Is Sherwin-Williams (SHW) Pricing Reflect Long-Term Potential After Recent Share Price Rebound
summary: If you have been wondering whether Sherwin-Williams at around US$348.52 is a fair deal or a stretch, this breakdown is aimed at helping you frame that question clearly. The stock has seen mixed returns, with a 7.1% gain over the last 30 days and a 6.3% return year to date, while the 1 year return is a 2.4% decline and the 3 year and 5 year returns sit at 56.7% and 58.0% respectively. Recent share price moves sit against a backdrop of ongoing interest in Sherwin-Williams as a major coatings...
